00027 #include <Inventor/nodes/SoSubNode.h>
00028 #include <Inventor/fields/SoMFUInt32.h>
00029 #include <Inventor/fields/SoMFVec3f.h>
00030 #include <Inventor/fields/SoMFVec2f.h>
00031 #include <Inventor/fields/SoSFEnum.h>
00032 
00033 class COIN_DLL_API SoVertexProperty : public SoNode {
00034   typedef SoNode inherited;
00035 
00036   SO_NODE_HEADER(SoVertexProperty);
00037 
00038 public:
00039   static void initClass(void);
00040   SoVertexProperty(void);
00041 
00042   // These must match 100% with the enum in SoMaterialBindingElement.
00043   enum Binding {
00044     OVERALL = 2,
00045     PER_PART,
00046     PER_PART_INDEXED,
00047     PER_FACE,
00048     PER_FACE_INDEXED,
00049     PER_VERTEX,
00050     PER_VERTEX_INDEXED
00051   };
00052 
00053   SoMFVec3f vertex;
00054   SoMFVec2f texCoord;
00055   SoMFVec3f texCoord3;
00056   SoMFVec3f normal;
00057   SoSFEnum normalBinding;
00058   SoMFUInt32 orderedRGBA;
00059   SoSFEnum materialBinding;
00060 
00061   virtual void doAction(SoAction * action);
00062   virtual void GLRender(SoGLRenderAction * action);
00063   virtual void getBoundingBox(SoGetBoundingBoxAction * action);
00064   virtual void callback(SoCallbackAction * action);
00065   virtual void pick(SoPickAction * action);
00066   virtual void getPrimitiveCount(SoGetPrimitiveCountAction * action);
00067 
00068 protected:
00069   virtual ~SoVertexProperty();
00070   virtual void notify(SoNotList *list);
00071 
00072 private:
00073   SbBool transparent;
00074   SbBool checktransparent;
00075 };
00076
